name: The Imported Tyre Manufacturers' Association
goal: The Imported Tyre Manufacturers' Association is a trade association representing new tyre manufacturers and tyre branders whose manufacturing bases are located outside the EU. A primary aim of the association is to keep its members fully informed of all technical and legislative developments relating to or impacting on tyres and their sale and use in European markets.
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Customs, Energy, Environment, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
- UNECE 1958 and 1998 agreements
- Automotive Type Approval Regulations
- Energy Labelling (Tyres) (MSTyr15 - PROSAFE)
- REACH
- Internal Market
